statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerComplaints
SELECT customer_id, complaint_description, resolution FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_description FROM CustomerComplaints ORDER BY complaint_id DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE date_created > '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM CustomerComplaints GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE complaint_id = 1;
SELECT complaint_description, resolution FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT customer_id, complaint_description FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE date_created BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT complaint_id, customer_id, DATE_FORMAT(date_created, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(complaint_id) AS total_complaints FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM complaints;
SELECT customer_name, complaint_date FROM complaints WHERE complaint_id = 1;
SELECT complaint_description FROM complaints WHERE complaint_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT resolution_description, resolution_date FROM resolutions ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, complaint_description FROM complaints INNER JOIN resolutions ON complaints.complaint_id = resolutions.complaint_id WHERE complaints.customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM complaints;
SELECT complaint_id, customer_name, complaint_date FROM complaints WHERE complaint_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, complaint_date, complaint_description FROM complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, r.resolution_date, r.resolution_description FROM complaints c JOIN resolutions r ON c.complaint_id = r.complaint_id;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(complaint_id) AS total_complaints FROM complaints GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(complaint_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM complaints ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, complaint_text FROM complaints WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT c.name, r.resolution_text FROM customers c JOIN resolutions r ON c.id = r.complaint_id;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND complaint_text LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT c.customer_id, r.resolved_at, c.name FROM complaints c JOIN resolutions r ON c.id = r.complaint_id WHERE r.resolution_text LIKE '%satisfied%' ORDER BY r.resolved_at ASC;

SELECT c.name, c.email, count(r.id) AS resolution_count FROM customers c LEFT JOIN resolutions r ON c.id = r.complaint_id GROUP BY c.name, c.email HAVING resolution_count > 3 ORDER BY resolution_count DESC;
SELECT c.name, r.resolution_text, r.resolved_at FROM customers c JOIN resolutions r ON c.id = r.complaint_id WHERE r.resolved_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' AND c.name ILIKE 'j%';
SELECT c.name, c.email, r.resolution_text, r.resolved_at FROM customers c LEFT JOIN resolutions r ON c.id = r.complaint_id WHERE r.resolved_at IS NOT NULL ORDER BY r.resolved_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerComplaints;
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_text FROM CustomerComplaints ORDER BY complaint_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT complaint_id, resolved FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE resolved = TRUE;
SELECT complaint_id, resolution_text, resolution_date FROM ComplaintResolution;
SELECT * FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE resolved = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM CustomerDetails ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT c.complaint_text, cr.resolution_text, cr.resolution_date FROM CustomerComplaints c JOIN ComplaintResolution cr ON c.complaint_id = cr.complaint_id;
SELECT cd.customer_name, cs.status, cs.update_date FROM CustomerDetails cd JOIN ComplaintStatus cs ON cd.customer_id = cs.complaint_id;

SELECT c.complaint_text, cr.resolution_text, cs.status FROM CustomerComplaints c JOIN ComplaintResolution cr ON c.complaint_id = cr.complaint_id JOIN ComplaintStatus cs ON c.complaint_id = cs.complaint_id ORDER BY c.complaint_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM complaints;
SELECT customer_id, complaint_text FROM complaints WHERE complaint_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT resolution_text, resolution_date FROM resolutions ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT regulation_text FROM regulations WHERE regulation_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT complaint_text FROM complaints WHERE customer_id = 1 AND complaint_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT resolution_text, resolution_date FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC, email DESC;
